Description: Zamil Industrial Investment (known as: Zamil Indust) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2002. Zamil Indust operates within the Materials sector focusing on Steel. It has Companies operating across Southern and Central Asia, Eastern Asia, the Carribian, Western Europe, Northern Africa, Europe, Southeast Asia, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Southern Europe. Zamil Indust is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 1998.
